page.title: 09CARS IN KEYSOE
page.content: In our survey there are 100 adults and 37 children. About 26 families have more than one car. Why is this? They need the cars because of where they work. 17 people work in Bedford,6 in Sharnbrook,1 goes to Cambridge and 1 travels to Milton Keynes. They also need the cars when they go shopping. Of the people we asked 30 families buy their groceries in Bedford. Only 1 person shops locally. For their meat 7 go to Kimbolton and 22 go to Bedford. Even for vegetables 10 shop in Bedford but all the rest shop locally or grow their own. For entertainment most people stay in the village or go to the local pub. Forms of transport used by Keysoe people,apart from cars, are vans, bicycles, buses and even a lorry.
